name: Better Twitter - July 2019
description: Alters the proportions of Twitter for better readability and utility after the July 2019 layout changes. Makes your feed larger and minimizes the navigation, trends, and "who to follow" sections. Not yet suitable for smaller screens. This CSS is a work in progress.
additional_info:
v1 scaled the side columns down to 65% of their original size

v2 corrected scaling issues within profile descriptions, increased size of feed to 900px, reduced padding between side columns and central feed, added spacing between tweets and user icons to prevent overlapping

to do:
